item.title: ChimpCheck: Concise and Effective Android Testing Library
item.description: High-level description of the architecture Compile Android Apps with ChimpCheck library Use ChimpCombinator to generate the test script Use ScalaBashing to run the script (suggested but optional) Build Instructions Current state of ChimpCheck is still experimental, hence build scripts we will write currently assume that you have certain libraries published in your local ivy2 repository. Follow these instructions to get started with ChimpCheck. 1. Configurate your Android application:

item.title: ChimpCheck
item.description: Introduction Combinator Library for writing test generators and test properties for Android Apps By Edmund Lam, Peilun Zhang and Bor-Yuh Evan Chang edmund.lam@colorado.edu, peilun.zhang@colorado.edu and evan.chang@colorado.edu ChimpCheck on Github: https://github.com/cuplv/ChimpCheck Notes ChimpCheck paper can be found here: arxiv It is offically accepted to appear in the Onward! 2017
